docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., March 14--The Security Council gave Cuba a hearing today on charges that the United States had inspired illegal action by the Organization of American States to exclude her from its activities and was even now planning armed...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., March 14--The Security Council gave Cuba a hearing today on charges that the United States had inspired illegal action by the Organization of American States to exclude her from its activities and was even now planning armed aggression against her.
